content:
{
  "primary_diagnosis": "IgA Nephropathy vs. Lupus Nephritis",
  "differential_diagnoses": [
    "IgA Nephropathy",
    "Lupus Nephritis Class III/IV",
    "Post-infectious Glomerulonephritis",
    "ANCA-associated Vasculitis",
    "Thin Basement Membrane Disease",
    "Chemical-induced Nephropathy"
  ],
  "key_findings": [
    "Young male with recurrent hematuria and proteinuria",
    "Dysmorphic RBCs and RBC casts",
    "Declining renal function (eGFR 42)",
    "Low complement levels (C3, C4)",
    "Positive ANA",
    "Bilateral renal enlargement on imaging",
    "Occupational exposure to chemicals",
    "Family history of kidney disease"
  ],
  "diagnostic_tests": [
    "Renal biopsy (urgent)",
    "Complete serologic workup including anti-dsDNA, ANCA",
    "24-hour urine protein collection",
    "Anti-PLA2R antibodies",
    "Anti-GBM antibodies",
    "Hepatitis B/C screening",
    "Chemical exposure assessment"
  ],
  "management_plan": {
    "immediate_actions": [
      "Nephrology consultation",
      "Blood pressure control",
      "Fluid status monitoring",
      "Occupational exposure prevention"
    ],
    "medications": [
      "Consider empiric corticosteroids after biopsy",
      "ACE inhibitor or ARB for proteinuria/hypertension",
      "Hold nephrotoxic medications"
    ]
  },
  "red_flags": [
    "Rapidly declining renal function",
    "Significant proteinuria",
    "Hypertension in young patient",
    "Low complement levels",
    "Chemical exposure risk"
  ],
  "patient_education": [
    "Importance of medication adherence",
    "Blood pressure monitoring",
    "Dietary sodium restriction",
    "Occupational safety measures",
    "Regular follow-up importance"
  ],
  "follow_up": {
    "timing": "Weekly initially",
    "monitoring": [
      "Renal function",
      "Urinalysis",
      "Blood pressure",
      "Complement levels",
      "Proteinuria quantification"
    ]
  },
  "confidence_in_assessment": 0.8,
  "uncertainties": [
    "Impact of chemical exposure",
    "Baseline renal function unknown",
    "Complete family history unavailable",
    "Previous stone disease documentation lacking",
    "Pending critical lab results"
  ]
}
